content.question: Has your {{ divorceWho }} given you their written consent to a divorce?
content.text: The court will contact your {{ divorceWho }} and ask them if they agree to a divorce.
content.questionHint: If you already have their written consent, you can send it to the court with your application. You don’t have to do this, but it may save you time later on.

yes.label: Yes
yes.additionalInfo: You can upload a digital photo or scan of the document later in this application or send it to the court by post.

no.label: No
no.additionalInfo: Your {{ divorceWho }} must give their consent to a divorce for you to use this reason. If they don’t, you’ll have to pay a fee to change your application and your divorce will be delayed.

reasonForDivorceRespondentConsent.required: Select whether your {{ divorceWho }} has given written consent to a divorce or not.
